text: @realDonaldTrump Charter schools are frauds. No wonder you support them. But the election isn’t about that. It’s about your incompetence leading to the deaths of 118,000+ Americans. #TrumpDeathToll118K #TrumpOwnsEveryDeath #TrumpVirus #ImpeachedForever #coronavirus
